A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot - and I mean a LOT - of the hate for this film is unfounded. There's a lot different here\, but I think this has the most powerful message of any Star Wars film and is the key to setting up the rest of Disney's Star Wars users. And for all the old-school Legends fans\, ESPECIALLY fans of KOTOR and KOTOR 2\, there's a couple of nods to you guys.
